pyqgis_plugin.name: FLO-2D MapCrafter v2.0.0
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin creates maps and plots from FLO-2D output files.
pyqgis_plugin.about: FLO-2D MapCrafter is a QGIS plugin designed to transform FLO-2D output files into comprehensive visualizations. It generates flood maps for single-phase simulations, sediment maps, mudflow maps, and two-phase simulation flood maps. Additionally, MapCrafter goes beyond by creating hazard maps, highlighting areas with elevated risks based on FLO-2D simulations, aiding in risk management. The plugin also streamlines the QGIS layout manager process by automatically generating templates for easy customization.
pyqgis_plugin.author: FLO-2D Software, Inc.
pyqgis_plugin.tags: python, mapping, flo-2d, flow routing, storm drain plots

pyqgis_plugin.name: FLO-2D Gila v2.0.0
pyqgis_plugin.about: The FLO-2D Plugin for QGIS is a tool to develop, format, analyze, and display data used by the FLO-2D Flood Model. The Plugin can import project data, generate data and ex-port appropriately formatted FLO-2D data input files for a FLO-2D Project. The FLO-2D-Plugin reference manual, installed on your computer with the software, describes the assumptions, functions, and processes applied in the QGIS Plugin. A companion manual, the FLO-2D QGIS Plugin Userâ€™s Manual, describes the workflow, outlines the data structure and presents tutorials for the Plugin. It does not address the functionality and use of the FLO-2D model which has a separate set of reference manuals.
pyqgis_plugin.author: FLO-2D Software, Inc.
pyqgis_plugin.tags: flow, 2d, grid, preprocess, geopackage, FLO-2D, flood modeling, 2d modeling
